verses.roman:
sei nanda-suta--ihaṅ caitanya-gosāñi
sei baladeva--ihaṅ nityānanda bhāi

synonyms: sei nanda-suta—the same son of Nanda Mahārāja; ihaṅ—now; caitanya-gosāñi—Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sei baladeva—the selfsame Baladeva; ihaṅ—now; nityānanda bhāi—Nityānanda Prabhu, the brother of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: The former son of Nanda Mahārāja is now Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and the former Baladeva, Kṛṣṇa's brother, is now Nityānanda Prabhu, the brother of Lord Caitanya.
